text:
Hi everyone :wave:
I’ve been send here by the HubSpot Chat support regarding an issue with the sync between Okta and HubSpot where the SCIM provision stopped synchronising the role for users… Any suggestions on which channel would be the best fit?

Hello! I have some questions about Workflows and making external API calls to retrieve data and branch off the information returned. Would there be an appropriate channel to ask this question? Thanks all!

Good morning,

I’ve been send here by the HubSpot support section.

We're setting up Google consent mode V2 for all our clients using HubSpot with the HubSpot Cookiebanner.
It looks like everything is working just fine, but I can't find the "personalization_storage" parameter in the knowledge article and the given code: <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/events/cookie-banner>

Is this correct or should we implement this in a different way?

Any help/answer is appreciated.
